name: WP Testimonials
author: Trustindex.io

sections.description:
Display your testimonials for free with our responsive widgets in 2 minutes. This plugin is absolutely free.

Testimonial Widgets plugin allows you to show off your best customer testimonials in stunning predesigned widgets on your website. You can create your widgets with a series of options, and filter customer testimonials to show off your business’s outstanding reputation.

Video about the plugin

If you care at all about growing your business and improving your online reputation, you’ll know just how important customer testimonials can be. Testimonials are what can set your company apart from the competition.

They provide valuable social proof to your business, which means that other consumers will have an easier time justifying choosing your company over another. The social proof from testimonies shows customers that you are the real deal, and that you are a company that can be trusted.

Plugin features

Here are some of the most important features of the Testimonial Widgets plugin.

  • Free usage
  • 21+ Widget layouts
  • 25+ Pre-designed widget styles
  • Upload unlimited testimonials
  • Create unlimited testimonial widgets
  • Categorize testimonials
  • Schema.org Markup
  • Language support
  • Shortcode integration
  • Keep all testimonials in a WordPress database
  • Dark website support
  • Use in any page builder: Gutenberg, Elementor, Page Origin, Beaver Builder, WPBakery, Divi, Classic
  • Zero loading time
  • Use of assets stored in CDN

Languages

If your company trades internationally, then you should cater to as many languages as possible.
Our Plugin supports the following languages:

Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kazakh, Korean, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Scottish Gaelic, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukranian, Vietnamese, Welsh

Support

If you’re struggling to set up the WP Testimonials Plugin then you can reach out to our customer support team in any of the following ways.

We offer 24/7 email support in English.

Before you do shoot us an email, though, make sure you read our FAQ where you can find the answers to many commonly asked questions.
sections.faq:
What is a Testimonial?

A testimonial is a statement, usually from a business customer, that affirms the quality of the business or its products / services.

How to display your testimonials on your WordPress website?

Download and activate the free plugin. Write and save at least 3 testimonials. Choose your widget layout and style. Insert the shortcode to your wordpress website.

Are the Testimonial Widgets fully responsive?

Yes, the Testimonial Widgets are fully responsive. You can control to show the number of testimonial columns on different devices (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile).

How can I display Testimonials on my Website?

With the Testimonial Widgets plugin you can easily display testimonials on your website. 35 widget layouts, 16 widget styles available.

Do I need coding skills to showcase testimonials?

No coding skills required.With just a few clicks, you can amazingly showcase your testimonials.

How can I collect Testimonials from my clients?

To collect testimonials, ask your customers via email to write their shopping experience.

What is a Testimonial Slider and why is it important?

A testimonial slider allows website visitors to scroll through various testimonials which lends social proof to a business.

Will this widget plugin automatically use my existing Testimonials?

No, you can’t import. You have to upload your testimonials manually.

How Can I Choose the Best Testimonials to be shown on my Website?

Choose testimonials that are short, concise, and provide specific feedback.

How many Testimonials can I add to my Testimonial Slider Widget?

You can add an unlimited number of testimonials to your widget.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Plugin released

1.3.5

  • Fix – Fix unknown format specifier S error
  • Add – Box settings (background color, padding, width, radius)
  • Add – Font settings (name size, name color, review size, review color)

1.4

  • Add – Slider interval
  • Change – Setup guide text

1.4.1

  • Add – Review lines
  • Change – Setup guide text

1.4.2

  • Add – Navigation arrow options
  • Fix – Notice error messages

1.4.3

  • Add – Navigation dots options
  • Fix – Delete widget vulnerability

1.4.4

  • Fix – Duplicate widget vulnerability
sections.reviews:
Great free plugin

By richardlemonideebv on March 5, 2024

Great plugin and works like advertised. One thing though: how can I translate 'read more' and 'hide'. I tried the loco plugin but couldn't locate the strings. Please advise!

Excellent

By laurentparenthese on February 28, 2024

A la vue des avis, nous avons hésité à télécharger ce plugin. Mais dès les premiers réglages, nous avons été ravis de la simplicité et de la qualité des restitutions. Merci aux développeurs.

I do not recommend

By fliih on July 13, 2023

A waste of time the plugin, I could translate it into Spanish, still change the settings of the adjustment. 4 hours wasted.

Can't be customized and can't be translated

By Carlos Rodríguez (carloslxxxiii) on June 29, 2023

Lost about 2 hours setting up my testimonials and the plugin doesn't work properly.

First: you can't customize some colors, although there are options for customizing colors they aren't working.

Second: can't be translated, the developers included a bunch of .mo files for different languages but failed to include a .pot file. Also, the only front facing string “Read More” can't be translated.

The site encountered a critical error

By mogorash on October 20, 2022

php 8.1 wp 6.0.3 You can't add code to the page until you turn off the plugin Gives a message in the column: Show your reviews The site encountered a critical error. Please check your admin inbox for further instructions. Learn more about troubleshooting WordPress issues.

Totally free plugin

By gaberzen115 on September 1, 2022

Good job. Easy to use and there are great widgets :)

dnt work

By juniorjlk on July 5, 2022

dnt work

Easy and free

By tillvb on March 9, 2022

Super! It was very easy to setup a new testimonial slider. Perfect.

Easy setup with multiple free layouts

By lacadev on February 7, 2022

With this plugin I can easily show customer testimonials to my visitors. There are lots of layouts and styles to choose from and it's completely free. It's quick to set up and not cluttered with unnecessary stuff. Nice design. Mobile responsive out of the box. Thank you!

short_description: Display your Testimonials on your website fast and easily. 21 widget types, 25 widget styles available. (Free Plugin)
